author: ThomASS33
title: Kip-69 Recenter + TAM PoT Primer
summary: Defined `kipID` as on-chain presence & identity witness
Outlined `TAM PoT` (Time As Mine) for attention-bound proof of intent
Verified hash manifest, gradient metadata, and BIP-index encoding
Introduced shard → steward → bloom flow as social-verification mechanism
Declared deterministic formula: `potHash = hash(wallet + kipID + timestamp + nonce)`
artifacts: TAM PoT hash formula + identity design
